msg: * 20.temp.buffer.mt.cpp: New test exercising the thread safety

author: brett
msg: - move doxia's site renderer to a model for the decoration, while retaining the <custom> element to allow arbitrary extension that can be used from the velocity template.
- simplify various parts of the API
- add inheritance of the site descriptor from a file based source
